title: am gonna go INSANE if i have to wait another hour for this broken game....
body:
am literally going crazy, it's been 15+ since i uninstalled my game and all it's files because they were corrupt i guess. i've downloaded-uninstalled the client and everything with it more than 3 times...
i tried the repair tool, i got a ticket, i went to twitter (support) but they all say the same, not that they haven't been helpful they have been a lot actually but it's not getting the job done. it seriously is frustrating.
so what happens is the following: 
1. i unistall all my game files and client
2. reinstall all my game files and client
3. it downloads and then it starts patching gets 1/2 (legacy client) or about 40% in new one then it breaks, it also takes FOREVER to do that
4. in the old client: the maximum it reaches in ~2 hours is 64% before breaking
     in new client: reaches 70% before breaking 
     both clients say the same thing:~ an unexpected error has occurred, check logs~
5.  back to square 1.

as you can see am getting despaired please, if anyone is even out there,** PLEASE.HELP.ME**

Most unexpected and unspecified errors after 33% are almost guaranteed to be issues with your network.  Your connection could be unstable or blocking access to our patching servers, so it's getting left behind or kicked off.  Reinstalling the game isn't going to fix this if your network can't patch.  Instead, go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  I know you've done a lot so far, but those steps don't assist with your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
